text: "Quicksand" is a 1971 song by David Bowie and is the sixth track from his fourth studio album Hunky Dory. The song is influenced by Buddhism, Occult and criminals. ==References== Category:1971 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Folk ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:David Bowie songs Category:Dinosaur Jr. songs
title: Quicksand (David Bowie song)
